teacher_info.intro: I am by my true nature an explorer. Like all explorers, I love nature.  It is mysterious and magical.  I feel that the most fascinating nature of all is human nature.  I am fascinated by how they are, how they behave, and their many intricate fascets.
teacher_info.introduction:
Hello! My name is Astghik. I am a native Armenian speaker and I also speak Russian as my native. I give private Russian lessons and theach Armenian grammer to schoolchildren.  As a future professional teacher I have learned many theories of teaching from many great teachers like Leo Tolstoy, Jan Jak Russo, John Locke ETC. I can say with confidence there are two important things in the learning process. One depends on the student and the other depends on the teacher. The student must have motivation. He should know what he needs this knowledge for. And the teacher should make the process pleasant. The most effective method is to make the learning process pleasant. 
I study a foreign language myself and I know how difficult it is to remember all these grammatical rules. I imagine how hard it can be when you study such a complex language as Russian or Armenian. For making the learning process easy in my lessons I make a bet not on the grammar, but on the speaking and listening. You will learn to speak Russian or Armenian with a minimum load on the grammar. Human is a lazy being and often it is difficult for him to force himself to repeat all these rules every day. But learning a foreign language is effective when you are doing it every day. For making you to learn every day and at the same time to train your listening, I will send you an audio after every lesson, considering your vocabulary. Firstly, you can listen to audio anywhere, it's more convenient than pulling a notebook. Secondly, we learn by listening like children. They have no idea about grammar, but they speak correctly.
teacher_info.about_me: I am by my true nature an explorer. Like all explorers, I love nature.  It is mysterious and magical.  I feel that the most fascinating nature of all is human nature.  I am fascinated by how they are, how they behave, and their many intricate fascets.
teacher_info.about_teacher: The truth is that as long as you are alive, you must learn. As soon as you stop doing that, then you're dead. And it does not matter that you are still physically alive. The other truth is that we learn by teaching. I like learning new things. And teaching is one more way to learn for me.
teacher_info.teaching_style: During my lessons I will make you talk. I think speaking is the best way to learn. Being good at grammar does not mean you can speak correctly. Therefore the most important thing is speaking. You won't sit around waiting to speak. You do not need to know all the grammar rules before starting to communicate. I am ready to listen with patience, to show and correct your mistakes. In my lessons, do not be afraid of mistakes. The earlier you begin to speak, the faster this process will become automatic.  Each time you will be think less and less about word choice. Grammar will come without you thinking about it.

course_info.trial_description: During the trial lesson I will get acquainted with your level of language proficiency to prepare an individual lesson for you.

pro_course_detail.title: Talking practice
pro_course_detail.description: Talk and practice your knowledge without thinking about the grammar. I will correct your mistakes during the lesson.

pro_course_detail.title: Talking practice
pro_course_detail.description: Talk and practice your knowledge without thinking about the grammar. I will correct your mistakes during the lesson.

pro_course_detail.title: Funny Armenian
pro_course_detail.description: The lesson consists of two parts. First part is grammar and second part is practice. I write strange texts for my students. The stranger the text, the easier it is to memorize new words. And the text also will help you to understand the grammar better. I make grammar as easy as possible for easy and funny learning.

teacher_info.intro:
Hello everyone! My name is Nastya. I am from the central part of Russia, the capital city of "Golden Ring". I love art and culture, so I got the profession of a guide. I love small trips and discovering uknown places for myself and others in very famous ones. 
Now I work as a proofreader of Russian texts. 
I like to do something new for myself and love new impressions from meetings, watching movies, walks.
teacher_info.about_me:
Hello everyone! My name is Nastya. I am from the central part of Russia, the capital city of "Golden Ring". I love art and culture, so I got the profession of a guide. I love small trips and discovering uknown places for myself and others in very famous ones. 
Now I work as a proofreader of Russian texts. 
I like to do something new for myself and love new impressions from meetings, watching movies, walks.
teacher_info.about_teacher: Since last year I have discovered the opportunity to communicate with people from different points of our planet.
teacher_info.teaching_style: I sincerely believe that learning should be informative and interesting, so the basis of learning is a conversation

course_info.trial_description: Will we get acquainted? I am waiting for your story about yourself and the place where you live./ Познакомимся? Жду вашего рассказа о себе!

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for beginners
pro_course_detail.description: If you are at the very beginning of learning Russian, welcome. Basics of grammar, pronunciation, learning words. I recommend doing homework, which I will check by the beginning of the next lesson.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for intermediate level
pro_course_detail.description: Сonversational practice, reading and discussing texts, grammar, new words and expressions. Homework if you wish.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for advanced level
pro_course_detail.description: Conversational practice, discussion of books, movies, travel. We choose the topic of the conversation before the lesson begins.

teacher_info.intro:
I am a Russian native speaker. I have a degree in Hospitality and three years of working experience at the best hotels in Moscow. Currently, I am a student at the University of Lodz, Poland. I do sports, play volleyball, it is a part of my life, as well as traveling and learning about different cultures, so we can share our knowledge and experience. I am passionate about helping people. 
Русский - мой родной язык. Я являюсь специалистом по гостеприимству, а также имею трехлетний опыт работы в лучших отелях Москвы. Сейчас я студент университета города Лодзь в Польше. Я играю в волейбол, люблю путешествовать и изучать разные культуры, так что мы можем поделиться опытом.
teacher_info.about_me:
I am a Russian native speaker. I have a degree in Hospitality and three years of working experience at the best hotels in Moscow. Currently, I am a student at the University of Lodz, Poland. I do sports, play volleyball, it is a part of my life, as well as traveling and learning about different cultures, so we can share our knowledge and experience. I am passionate about helping people. 
Русский - мой родной язык. Я являюсь специалистом по гостеприимству, а также имею трехлетний опыт работы в лучших отелях Москвы. Сейчас я студент университета города Лодзь в Польше. Я играю в волейбол, люблю путешествовать и изучать разные культуры, так что мы можем поделиться опытом.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I am passionate about helping people. And I have learned that practicing a new language or maintaining what you have already possessed is vital. I am attentive, responsive, and just an easy-going person. 
Я люблю помогать людям, и я поняла, на сколько важно практиковать изучаемый язык. Я внимательный, отзывчивый и трудолюбивый человек.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I am convinced that learning a new language should be interesting and engaging. So, in our classes, we are going to talk a lot and just have fun, but also I will clear up the features of the Russian language, some nuances of grammar, punctuation, and pronunciation. 
Я убеждена, что изучение языка должно быть интересным. Поэтому на наших уроках мы будем много разговаривать и просто приятно проводить время. Я также расскажу об особенностях русского языка, о некоторых нюансах грамматики, пунктуации и произношения.

course_info.trial_description: Let us get to know each other a bit better! We will clarify our goals, vision and direction. We will see how I can help you.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Speaking Practice
pro_course_detail.description: Depending on your preferences we will practice Russian always keeping in mind the way native speakers do that.

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian (all levels)
pro_course_detail.description: If you are a newcomer in this journy I will be glad to support you and help to get acquainted with a new language.

teacher_info.intro:
PL: Mam na imię Alina. Mam 24 lata i 5 lat temu przeprowadziłam się do Polski, by ukończyć tutaj studia filologiczne oraz zagłębić się w kulturę i język, który pokochałam. Uczę rosyjskiego i polskiego jako obcego od 5 lat. Uwielbiam uczyć, ale kiedy mam chwilkę to podróżuję, uczę się włoskiego, biegam i nurkuję.  Jestem osobą otwartą i ciekawą świata.

RUS: Меня зовут Алина. Мне 24 года и 5 лет назад я переехала в Польшу, чтобы окончить здесь филфак и погрузиться в культуру и язык, который полюбила. Я преподаю русский и польский как иностранный уже 5 лет. Я люблю учить, но когда у меня есть время, я путешествую, учу итальянский, бегаю и занимаюсь дайвингом. Я открыта и любознательна.
teacher_info.short_signature: Russian/Polish teacher with 5+ years of experience in Public and Private schools
teacher_info.about_me:
PL: Mam na imię Alina. Mam 24 lata i 5 lat temu przeprowadziłam się do Polski, by ukończyć tutaj studia filologiczne oraz zagłębić się w kulturę i język, który pokochałam. Uczę rosyjskiego i polskiego jako obcego od 5 lat. Uwielbiam uczyć, ale kiedy mam chwilkę to podróżuję, uczę się włoskiego, biegam i nurkuję.  Jestem osobą otwartą i ciekawą świata.

RUS: Меня зовут Алина. Мне 24 года и 5 лет назад я переехала в Польшу, чтобы окончить здесь филфак и погрузиться в культуру и язык, который полюбила. Я преподаю русский и польский как иностранный уже 5 лет. Я люблю учить, но когда у меня есть время, я путешествую, учу итальянский, бегаю и занимаюсь дайвингом. Я открыта и любознательна.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
POL: Jeśli zapytać moich uczniów o to, jakim nauczycielem jestem, to z pewnością powiedzą, że jestem przede wszystkim przyjacielem. Niezależnie od umiejętności językowych czy poprzedniego doświadczenia w nauce zawsze chętnie pomagam moim uczniom zrozumieć, jak działa ten "konstruktor" językowy, rozmawiając na tematy, które najbardziej ich interesują.

RUS: Если спросить моих учеников, какой я преподаватель, они с уверенностью скажут, что я - друг. Независимо от языковых умений и опыта в изучении я всегда с удовольствием помагаю ученикам понять, как работает этот языковой "конструктор", говоря при этом на темы, которые больше всего их интересуют.
teacher_info.teaching_style: Podczas lekcji indywidualnych w zależności od poziomu językowego ucznia pracujemy najczęściej nad słownictwem oraz konstrukcjami gramatycznymi. Na zajęciach także skupiamy się nad wymową: rozumienie i odtwarzanie dźwięków jest bardzo ważne podczas komunikowania się w językach słowiańskich. Każda lekcja jest swego rodzaju konwersacją, podczas której pomagam uczniowi głębiej zrozumieć też kulturową otoczkę języka, którego uczę. Zawsze dostosowuję plan zajęć do indywidualnych potrzeb ucznia oraz proponuję dodatkowe materiały w postaci filmów, seriali, muzyki czy tekstów literackich.

course_info.trial_description: Podczas lekcji próbnej mamy okazję poznać się, dopasować tematy oraz metody współpracy według indywidualnych zainteresowań ucznia. Omawiamy strategię, która najbardziej odpowiada uczącemu się, a także wyznaczamy cele.

pro_course_detail.title: Rosyjski dla każdego - Русский для каждого
pro_course_detail.description: Podczas lekcji w zależności od poziomu językowego oraz potrzeb uczącego się pracujemy nad zagadnieniami gramatycznymi w języku rosyjskim oraz słownictwem na podstawie wybranych działów tematycznych. Lekcje przewidują też zagłębienie się w kulturę krajów rosyjskojęzycznych.

pro_course_detail.title: Rosyjski w prakryce: konwersacje z native speakerem
pro_course_detail.description: PL: W trakcie lekcji konwersacyjnych wybieramy działy i tematy, które najbardziej interesują ucznia. Ćwiczymy płynność budowy zdań, doskonalimy umiejętności posługiwania się językiem rosyjskim w każdej sytuacji. Lekcje też przewidują krótkie treści związane z poprawnością wymowy i poszerzeniem wiedzy na temat stylu potocznego, czyli jak tak naprawdę mówić po rosyjsku? Na podstawie odbytych konwersacji na życzenie ucznia tworzone są indywidualne materiały dla samodzielnego powtórzenia i utrwalenia materiału.

pro_course_detail.title: Polski dla każdego - Польский для каждого
pro_course_detail.description: Уроки могут проходить все, независимо от уже полученого уровня . Занятия предусматривают целостный подход: совершенствуется произношение, объясняется грамматика, которая необходима для достижения определённого уровня учеником, практикуется речь, а также расширяется словарный запас на основе выбранных тематик. Уроки могут быть видоизменены в соответствии с предпочтениями и интересами учащегося. Во время уроков используются аудио- и видеоматериалы. Подбор книжных пособий осуществляется индивидуально.

pro_course_detail.title: Polski w praktyce - zajęcia konwersacyjne
pro_course_detail.description: Данные уроки предусматривают прежде работу с устной речью, произношением и словарным запасом. Темы определяются индивидуально, в зависимости от нужд и и интересов ученика. На основе разговора создаются дополнительные материалы для самостоятельного повторения и зактрепления материала.

teacher_info.intro:
My name is Hanna. I am into teaching! It’s my thing. There are two most important days in your life: when you come to the world and when you understand your purpose. 
I am happy to help people to learn Russian and see how their life changes!
I like psychology, I really like to help people.
teacher_info.short_signature: I use communicative method  in my lessons❤️Learn Russian with pleasure ✨
teacher_info.about_me:
My name is Hanna. I am into teaching! It’s my thing. There are two most important days in your life: when you come to the world and when you understand your purpose. 
I am happy to help people to learn Russian and see how their life changes!
I like psychology, I really like to help people.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I have been teaching Russian to people from all around the world for 2 years. I help my students to appreciate and understand the importance of Russian in our daily lives.
I helped many students to pass exams, find their love in Russia, speak fluently with friends and feel confidence in speaking with natives!
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I find the process of working with students to reach their language goals highly rewarding.
I am learning about pedagogy, and adopting new teaching strategies allow me to become a better teacher for all my students.

course_info.trial_description:
At the trial lesson we will get acquainted with you, I will check your level, give the best recommendations that can help you to improve your level.

Also, we will set a goal with you for learning Russian.
Looking forward to seeing YOU!!!

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
We will focus on your goal, why you need to learn Russian.
Our lessons will be interactive where  you can make mistakes and learn Russian for pleasure.
We will learn Russian with you with different books, presentations, games, interesting tasks.

I will show you that Russian isn't difficult, it can be funny and with pleasure.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Russian (Разговорный русский)
pro_course_detail.description: We will focus on your speaking skills. We will discuss with you topics that you like, that you need. I make friendly atmosphere for my students, so you will learn Russian like you speak with your friend,

pro_course_detail.title: Speak about psychology
pro_course_detail.description:
I like helping people.  That's why I want to show you that you are unique! I am studing  psychology now, It will be my second education. 
If you are really need my help to discover yourself and make your life better and at the same time, you want to learn Russian, I will be happy to help you with it!!!!

teacher_info.intro:
My lessons are tailored for each student considering their interests and goals and suitable for all levels. I've got a certificate in teaching Russian as a a foreign language in the centre of the Russian language of Moscow State University and a linguistic higher education. 

Привет! Я — носитель и преподаватель русского языка. Я получила квалификацию преподавателя русского языка как иностранного в "Центре русского языка Московского Государственного Университета", а также высшее лингвистическое образование.  Готовлю уроки специально для каждого ученика с учетом целей и интересов.
teacher_info.about_me:
My lessons are tailored for each student considering their interests and goals and suitable for all levels. I've got a certificate in teaching Russian as a a foreign language in the centre of the Russian language of Moscow State University and a linguistic higher education. 

Привет! Я — носитель и преподаватель русского языка. Я получила квалификацию преподавателя русского языка как иностранного в "Центре русского языка Московского Государственного Университета", а также высшее лингвистическое образование.  Готовлю уроки специально для каждого ученика с учетом целей и интересов.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I use a communicative approach in teaching as I know from experience that it leads to massive results. I'm constantly learning and improving my teaching skills and strive to provide the best quality.

 Использую коммуникативную методику преподавания. Всегда продолжаю учиться и развиваться как преподаватель, стараюсь обеспечить лучшее качество уроков.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
We will practice speaking, pronunciation, grammar, learn new vocabulary, discuss any topics of your interest. I'm fond of travelling, getting to know people, learning cultures, languages, history, cuisines, literature, music, films, oil painting, technologies, nature, animals and many other things. 

Мы обсудим интересные вам темы, потренируемся в произношении, говорении, аудировании, выучим новую лексику, разберёмся в грамматике.
Я люблю путешествия, узнавать новое, изучать разные культуры, историю, национальную кухню, литературу, музыку, фильмы, живопись, технологии, природу и многое другое.

course_info.trial_description: Tailored lessons based on your preference of activities: pronunciation, grammar and conversation practice, exercises, discussions, all based on up-to-date textbooks and other materials

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for beginners A0-A1
pro_course_detail.description:
This course is for you if you are only thinking of learning Russian or you have already started it, but haven't reached elementary level fully.
Tailored lessons based on your preference of activities, can be with exercises, pronunciation, grammar and conversation practice, discussions, all based on up-to-date textbooks and other materials, articles, songs, films, books, etc.

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian, levels A1-C1 | Conversational practice
pro_course_detail.description: Tailored lessons based on your preference of activities, can be with exercises, pronunciation, grammar and conversation practice, discussions, all based on up-to-date textbooks and other materials, articles, songs, films, books, etc.

pro_course_detail.title: For students who studied with me before February 2022
pro_course_detail.description:
Russian for beginners A0-A1 | General Russian, levels A1-C1 | Conversational practice

Tailored lessons based on your preference of activities, can be with exercises, pronunciation, grammar and conversation practice, discussions, all based on up-to-date textbooks and other materials, articles, songs, films, books, etc.

teacher_info.intro:
Привет, меня зовут Екатерина, но ты можешь звать меня Катя. Я русская, живу в России, русский - мой родной язык. Люблю разговаривать о культурах разных стран, повседневной жизни, мифологии, фильмах, книгах, всём-всём.
Сама уже много лет изучаю английский, китайский, японский. 
Ну что, поговорим?

Hi, my name's Ekaterina. I am from Russia and I speak Russian. I have always been interested in languages and both studying and teaching them, so here I am.
teacher_info.about_me:
Привет, меня зовут Екатерина, но ты можешь звать меня Катя. Я русская, живу в России, русский - мой родной язык. Люблю разговаривать о культурах разных стран, повседневной жизни, мифологии, фильмах, книгах, всём-всём.
Сама уже много лет изучаю английский, китайский, японский. 
Ну что, поговорим?

Hi, my name's Ekaterina. I am from Russia and I speak Russian. I have always been interested in languages and both studying and teaching them, so here I am.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Окончила педагогический университет. Преподаю языки уже четыре года. Работаю как с начинающими, так и с продолжающими.
I have a bachelor degree in Teaching English and Chinese.  I have worked with different types of students from all over the world.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Люблю побуждать учеников к разговору на самых ранних этапах, говорим как можно больше. 
Помогаю ПОНЯТЬ материал.
Использую различные материалы, ориентируюсь на потребности учеников.

course_info.trial_description: Hello, nice to meet you. If you're interested in the Russian language, let me show you how beautiful it is, we can talk for a while and I also can teach you some interesting facts about Russian :)

pro_course_detail.title: Разговорный русский/Russian conversation practice/俄语口语
pro_course_detail.description:
Let's talk! If you've already learned some grammar and vocabulary, but still shy to talk with people, because you are not sure how to use all your knowledge, you can make your first steps with me. We well discuss different topics, broaden your vocabulary and gradually make you used to a daily conversation.

Если вы уже какое-то время изучаете русский и хотите попрактиковаться в разговорной речи с носителем, то я могу помочь вам. Мы можем говорить на разные темы, обсудить интересующие вас вопросы о русском языке и культуре. Эти уроки помогут вам расширить словарный запас и преодолеть языковой барьер.

pro_course_detail.title: Русский язык/Russian language/俄语
pro_course_detail.description:
In these lessons we use a textbook with structured lessons and some extra materials I find useful for better understanding. We focus on grammar, reading and listening. We also develop speaking skills on the basis of the topic of the lesson.

На этих уроках мы будем использовать учебник со структурированными уроками, а также различные дополнительные материалы. Мы будем делать упор на грамматику, чтение и аудирование. Мы также будем уделять внимание развитию разговорных навыков.

teacher_info.intro: Hey! My name is Alex! I've lived my whole life between Russian and UK. Went to school on the south-east and then to university on the west! I've got a science Bachelors Degree in Mathematics and Philosophy from the University of Bristol. So I can help you out with your maths too! My biggest passion is music - I write, produce, mix songs and soon will turn my passion into my profession. We can talk about your favourite artists and break down their songs! Maybe even remake some of them... To be honest, I'm curious about a plentitude of things - it's just a matter of getting the convo rolling!
teacher_info.about_me: Hey! My name is Alex! I've lived my whole life between Russian and UK. Went to school on the south-east and then to university on the west! I've got a science Bachelors Degree in Mathematics and Philosophy from the University of Bristol. So I can help you out with your maths too! My biggest passion is music - I write, produce, mix songs and soon will turn my passion into my profession. We can talk about your favourite artists and break down their songs! Maybe even remake some of them... To be honest, I'm curious about a plentitude of things - it's just a matter of getting the convo rolling!
teacher_info.about_teacher: I believe that languages are not an academic discipline but rather a skill, and like any skill, it becomes better with practice. Real-life communication is the best way to improve your languages. I learnt that myself because as a kid I was practically forced to learn English as none of my peers could understand me. We're going to talk and discuss current matters in the world and your life just as you would if you meet a new person when you are abroad.
teacher_info.teaching_style: The lessons are informal, but structured - I keep a track record of the topics and their difficulty so then we can see progress! But you'll feel it anyway! If you want, I can correct you with reference to academic terminology too because as a young kid I went to a Russian school - so I have an idea of the conventional approach to teaching is. My unique selling point (if you wish) is the engagement with music! Let's break down your favourite songs!
teacher_info.interest: Family emergency and I have to go to another city. Will be back after 11th!
teacher_info.offline_reason: Family emergency and I have to go to another city. Will be back after 11th!

course_info.trial_description: A great opportunity to get to know each other and pick the direction of our future lessons. We'll establish what you're trying to improve on and what your end goal is in languages.

pro_course_detail.title: Engaging english with a possible musical twist
pro_course_detail.description: A lesson during which we will discuss your favourite aspects of the entertainment industry - Western books, movies and music. As lessons progress, we can start breaking down each project in more detail all whilst you're perfecting your English.

pro_course_detail.title: На русском о западной и российской культуре
pro_course_detail.description: Увлекательные и структурированные беседы о самых ярких представителях современной западной и отечественной культуре. Разбор творчества и успехов.

teacher_info.intro:
Всем привет, меня зовут Екатерина и мне 25 лет. Я провессиональный учитель, танцор и переводчик. Моя жизнь всегда была наполнена креативом и искусством. А еще я очень люблю путешествствовать. Cейчас я  проживаю и учусь во Франции. Наши встречи будут всегда яркими и интересными. Я буду безмерно рада помочь вам в изучении иностранных языков.

Hello! My name is Ekaterina. I'm an online teacher and a dancer. I'm really fond of travelling, music, dancing, art, languages and sport. You can be sure that our meetings will be always full of joy and smilling.
teacher_info.short_signature: Experienced French teacher / C1 French level certificate
teacher_info.about_me:
Всем привет, меня зовут Екатерина и мне 25 лет. Я провессиональный учитель, танцор и переводчик. Моя жизнь всегда была наполнена креативом и искусством. А еще я очень люблю путешествствовать. Cейчас я  проживаю и учусь во Франции. Наши встречи будут всегда яркими и интересными. Я буду безмерно рада помочь вам в изучении иностранных языков.

Hello! My name is Ekaterina. I'm an online teacher and a dancer. I'm really fond of travelling, music, dancing, art, languages and sport. You can be sure that our meetings will be always full of joy and smilling.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Я работаю репетитором уже 5 лет. Самое большое удовольствие для меня - это видеть успех своих студентов. Мы сможем говорить на самые важные и интересные для вас темы, что поможет вам перейти на новый уровень. 

I love teaching and I've been given lessons for 5 years. The best thing for me is to see the results of my students. I always try to use the maximum of my creativity to make your learning more interesting. Our speaking practices will help you to feel more comfortable and extend your vocabulary. I always try to be creative and I listen to you needs.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Моя цель как учителя - помочь вам в изучении языка. Для меня самое главное, чтобы мой студент чувствовал мою поддержку и не боялся ошибиться. Чем больше мы ошибаемся, тем быстрее мы учимся.

My goal is to help you. The most important thing is to help you feel comfortable and supported. I will never judge you for your mistakes. I offer you speaking practice in Russian for all levels. As my mother language is Russian I will help you to sound better and use native phrases. Homework is optional. I also offer French lessons. My living and studying in France help me to use only native lexic during my classes. I use native videos and audio, and different interactive activities.

course_info.trial_description:
Привет! На пробном уроке мы начнем наше знакомство при помощи иностранного языка. Евли вы начинающий, то уже на этом занятии вы начнете говорить. Для продвинутых учеников у меня подготовлена отличная языковая практика, которая поможет создать доверительную атмосферу и познакомит нас.

Hi! During this trial lesson we'll be able to get to know each other. You'll start to speak from your first lesson! If you are a beginner, I will help you to say your first words in foreign language. If you are at an advanced level, we'll have a great discussion with a feedback in the end.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian conversation course
pro_course_detail.description:
Разговорная практика.

- This class helps you to speak with no fear
- We speak about anything
- I can give you some materials to practice after our class
- Your level doesn't matter
- You can choose the topic you need

pro_course_detail.title: French pronunciation
pro_course_detail.description:
Уроки французского произношение
You can sound like a native speaker!

- If French people don't understand you
- We work with your difficulties
- I'll give you tips to sound better
- Classes include videos, notes and materials

pro_course_detail.title: French conversation course
pro_course_detail.description:
Разговорная практика

- We talk about everything
- You can choose a topic
- Feedback with vocabulary help in the end of the class
- Phrases used by native speakers!

teacher_info.intro:
Hello, everybody! :)

My name is Alina. I'm a 19-year-old student of law who is inspired to teach on Italki. I promise good and individualised education, positive mood and broadening horixons.

Let's master Russian and English with me! Join ranks of my students. That will be a great journey!)
teacher_info.about_me:
Hello, everybody! :)

My name is Alina. I'm a 19-year-old student of law who is inspired to teach on Italki. I promise good and individualised education, positive mood and broadening horixons.

Let's master Russian and English with me! Join ranks of my students. That will be a great journey!)
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Despite the fact that I do not have official teaching experience, I am excellent in teaching other people. Since school times, I have always had the gift of explaining, teaching others in such a way that everything is laid out on their shelves. 

A striking example for me is teaching English my 5-year-old sister from the age of 3. And she's doing great.

At school I participated in Olympiads in Russian language and literature and won prizes at different stages of the Olympiad movement. Therefore, I know simple and fast methods for studying the Russian language.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I believe that it is necessary to focus on each student in different ways, since everyone has his own way of remembering things. 

Some has auditory memory, so they have inclination to conversations on certain topics, auditions, etc. Others, like me, operate on visual memory, so it's better create various interacts, presentations, diagrams and tables.

What is more, I can not only give You basic lexics, but also emphesize to legal vocabulary.

My style of teching has relaxed and friendly atmosphere. A cup of tea, informal talks are keys to pleasent and productive studying :)

course_info.trial_description: This lesson will target on oral practice. In particular we're going to get acquainted, set further goals. What is more, we will try to find similarities between Russian and Your language to make it easier and more enjoyable.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Basic Course
pro_course_detail.description:
We will aim at such aspects of Russian language as:
1. pronunciation (difficult letter combinations; accents)
2. grammar:
    а. nouns, adjectives, verbs, pronouns, numerals; setting gender, pl/sg forms, cases, time etc/ etc. + adverbs
    b. simple and complex sentences; word order; direct and indirect speech
3. spelling (percussion and unstressed vowels; "ь/ъ" etc.)
4. Lexics (depends on you preferable sphere)

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Speking (any topic; any level)
pro_course_detail.description:
This lesson will target on picking up new lexics, broadening vocabulary. 
-You can choose any topic.
-You can start from any level.
-All will be individualised (presentations/tables/only oral speaking etc.)
Sign up :)

pro_course_detail.title: English Speaking (any topic/any level)
pro_course_detail.description:
We can mention any topic you wish. Science, politics, art, nature, education.. All the topics which bother your mind! 
Be free to express your thoghts :)

teacher_info.intro: Hello everyone! My name is Venera. I am Russian language teacher here on italki. I am originally Armenian but I was born in Moscow. Russian is my native language. I also speak Bulgarian because me and my family moved to Sofia when I was younger. And later on I moved to Prague and that is where I had a chance to improve my English skills.
teacher_info.about_me: Hello everyone! My name is Venera. I am Russian language teacher here on italki. I am originally Armenian but I was born in Moscow. Russian is my native language. I also speak Bulgarian because me and my family moved to Sofia when I was younger. And later on I moved to Prague and that is where I had a chance to improve my English skills.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I love languages and I truly enjoy the studying process. I would like to share with you my joy for learning languages and help you with your Russian language skills. Hope to see you soon on one of my lessons.
teacher_info.teaching_style: I offer conversational lessons as well as grammar lessons. I accept any other options you might have. You can contact me in advance and we can discuss all the possibilities.

course_info.trial_description: Trial lesson is designed to get to know each other, understand the goal of the student as well as language level.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation Russian Lesson
pro_course_detail.description: If you would like to improve your Russian conversational skills, this lesson is for you. You can choose any topics you would like to talk about. I can prepare vocabulary, discussion topics and etc upon your request.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian grammar lessons
pro_course_detail.description: Does not matter if you are just a beginner or you have advanced Russian language skills, you can book this lesson in case you want to work on improving the grammar, writing skills, listening and etc.  It would be ideal if you could inform me in advance what exactly would you like to look at so that I can be fully prepared for the lesson.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational English Lesson
pro_course_detail.description: If you would like to improve your English conversational skills, this lesson is for you. You can choose any topics you would like to talk about. I can prepare vocabulary, discussion topics and etc upon your request.

teacher_info.intro: Hi everyone! My name is Alina and I am a Russian teacher. I have been teaching for over 5 years amd during this time I have gained extensive experience in teaching people of different ages, levels, countries and backgrounds.
teacher_info.about_me: Hi everyone! My name is Alina and I am a Russian teacher. I have been teaching for over 5 years amd during this time I have gained extensive experience in teaching people of different ages, levels, countries and backgrounds.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I am passionate about teaching: I love to share my knowledge and it truely warms my heart when I see my students progressing.
teacher_info.teaching_style: Rather than subscribe rigidly to any single teaching method, I prefer to take a “student-centred” approach to teaching. I recognise that students are unique, differing in the way they learn: accordingly I tailor my lesson plans for each individual to achieve the best outcomes. For my lessons I provide all the required material which has been carefully selected for each student’s level, goals and learning style.

course_info.trial_description: On the trial lesson we will know each other. I will know more about your goals, level and desires in studying. Also we will have a basic conversation in Russian or a test.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Language for Beginners
pro_course_detail.description: Beginner Russian lessons include alphabet, grammar, vocabulary and listening exercises. You will learn the basics of Russian and it will help you to start to speak Russian quickly.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Language Elementary and Intermediate
pro_course_detail.description: If you've been learning Russian before and you want to resume lessons or to increase your level,  I can highly recommend you to book a lesson with me. We can talk about anything you want, learn more grammar and of course we can improve your understanding of the Russian culture and your conversational skills.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Language Upper Intermediate and Advanced
pro_course_detail.description: If you've been learning Russian before and you want to resume lessons or to increase your level,  I can highly recommend you to book a lesson with me. We can talk about anything you want, learn more grammar and of course we can improve your understanding of the Russian culture and your conversational skills.

teacher_info.intro: Hi! My name is Anna. I am a University student. I study The hospitality industry. I finished two Colleges before. My specializations were: Catering organization; Sales management. I like to read literature, learn foreign languages, and travel. I spend my free time with family and cook different dishes for them.
teacher_info.about_me: Hi! My name is Anna. I am a University student. I study The hospitality industry. I finished two Colleges before. My specializations were: Catering organization; Sales management. I like to read literature, learn foreign languages, and travel. I spend my free time with family and cook different dishes for them.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I'm a native Russian speaker. I study one at University too. So I can share my knowledge with you. I help you to improve your speaking, writing, and phonetics. In our lessons, we will talk, read and analyze different texts. I will teach you to express your thoughts in the Russian language correctly.
teacher_info.teaching_style: We will have lessons that include speaking, reading, writing, and vocabulary. We will discuss different topics and study grammar step by step.

course_info.trial_description: Hello! I'm glad to see you in my trial lesson. In that lesson, we can recognize one another and build your learning program.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation practice for beginners, Conversational Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
The class focuses on theme topics like in a cafe, in the airport, in the market and etc. That will include: 
- vocabulary 
- pronunciation
- grammar

Let's start! See you at my lesson.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation practice in Russian - intermediate to advanced levels
pro_course_detail.description:
That class focuses on topics you are interested in. 
I will correct your pronunciation, grammar mistakes.
I'll help you to express your thoughts in the Russian language correctly.
I'll be glad to answer any of your questions. So feel free to ask me.
Please If you want to discuss any subject, in particular, you can bring a topic and share it with me before our session. I will prepare a personal lesson for you.
Let's start!

pro_course_detail.title: Let's Read Together
pro_course_detail.description: That class focuses on reading, pronunciation, and spelling. I have some reading material ready for you, but you can bring yours. We can choose to read anything from a simple paragraph to a newspaper article, a children's book, comics, or start reading a book! Let me know what subjects you're interested in.

teacher_info.intro:
Hi, my name is Valentina! I am an online teacher.
My interests: long walks, reading books, finance and investments, knitting, series, museums and cooking.  I also love to travel and meet new people. Our meetings will always be filled with positive and a great mood.
Teaching is my passion!
teacher_info.about_me:
Hi, my name is Valentina! I am an online teacher.
My interests: long walks, reading books, finance and investments, knitting, series, museums and cooking.  I also love to travel and meet new people. Our meetings will always be filled with positive and a great mood.
Teaching is my passion!
teacher_info.about_teacher: I lived in Russia and am a native Russian speaker, I know all the subtleties of the language and the culture of this country. I will be very happy to share my knowledge with you. All my friends tell me that I am friendly and patient, so be prepared to speak, laugh, read and even sing with me in Russian. If you are interested in "Business Russian" my few years in the financial industry will be helpful for that. My classes will give you the knowledge appropriate to your level and needs, and I will support you and answer all your questions about Russian. In addition, I have an intermediate level of English (Intermediate).
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Individual lessons with me:
- Language practice
- cultural immersion
- serious corrections to your mistakes 
- communication 99% in Russian
 At each lesson, we will spend a lot of time talking. The topic can be any, it all depends on your interests and goals.

With a trial lesson: 
- Get to know your teacher and Russian 
- Evaluate your level 
- Define your curriculum and ultimate goal. 

What classes do I offer?
- Business Russian
- Russian for Beginners and Intermediate learners
- Friendly conversations on everyday topics
- Russian for Special Purposes

exp_info.job: Teacher of Russian as a foreign language
exp_info.description: I have been on this platform since November 2020, I have students and feedback. https://preply.com/en/tutor/897685/

cert_info.description: Completion of the "iTeach" course in teaching Russian as a foreign language
cert_info.certificate: Teacher of  Russian as a foreign language

course_info.trial_description:
📌 What is a trial lesson? 
My trial lessons are an opportunity to get to know you, the student, and me, the teacher, better to find out if we are a good fit for each other. My trial lessons serve the function of consultation, needs and goals analysis.

📌 How does it work?
I will walk you through the lesson options to find the type of lessons that work best for you. I'm happy to give personalized recommendations and tell you how I can help you improve your Russian in our future lessons.

📌 Interested? 
Please email me directly to discuss your options and choices before your first class.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for Beginners. Для начинающих 👀🐣 (А0-В1)
pro_course_detail.description:
📌 What is Russian for beginners? 
Classes that are designed specifically for beginners. We'll start with the basics: 
- the alphabet
- grammar
- speaking
- reading
- Speech comprehension of native Russian speakers.

📌 Who is this for?
✅ Level: This course is available for those who know nothing or know only the basics
✅ Age: Students of any age over 11 are welcome.
✅ Goal: To learn to read, write, understand and speak Russian.

📌 Interested? 
Please feel free to send me a message to ask more specific questions.

! Rules for the lesson:
Please give 24 hours notice if you need to reschedule or cancel the class. If you give me less than 24 hours notice, there is no refund because I will not be able to give your class to another student, and I might plan my day differently.

pro_course_detail.title: Speaking Club 💬📢 Поговорим? (В1-С2)
pro_course_detail.description:
📌 Who is it for?
✅ Level: This course is available to intermediate (B1) level (and above) 
✅ Age: Students of any age over 11 are welcome
✅ Objective: This is a conversation NOT an exam class 

📌 What are my Speaking Club options? 
Please select your preference from the following list:

– Open Conversation: This class focuses on open conversation with no plan or schedule, just like conversation in real life! Choice a topic yourself or select one from my pre-selected list. 

– Structured Conversation: Each session is based around pre-selected topic (which features a short yet interesting article) to prompt and drive the conversation. This course contains added vocubulary input through these articles. 

📌 Interested? 
Please do message me directly to discuss your options and choices before your first class.

Naturally, I will correct any pronunciation mistakes or awkward phrases that come up during the course of our conversation.

Rules for the lesson:

1. Please give 24 hours notice if you need to reschedule or cancel the class. If you give me less than 24 hours notice, there is no refund because I will not be able to give your class to another student, and I might plan my day differently.

2. Talk as much as you can.

pro_course_detail.title: Business Russian 💼📞📨📊
pro_course_detail.description:
📌 What is the Business Russian course? 
This course covers topics such as: 
- Getting to know each other
- Work and leisure
- Product & Service
- Sales
- Customers.
- Business Meeting
- Competition
- Finance
- Innovation
- Conflicts
- Hiring
- Investments
- Scheduling
- Time management
- Human Resources Management. 

📌 How does it work?
The course includes: listening to audio materials, reading texts, practicing dialogues, improving skills, using the studied vocabulary and grammar material in practice.

📌 Who is it for?
✅ Level: This course is available for intermediate (A2+) level. 
✅ Age: Students of any age over 16 are welcome.
✅ Purpose: To achieve your specific business or career goals

📌 Interested? 
Please do message me directly to discuss your options and choices before your first class.

! Rules for the lesson:
Please give 24 hours notice if you need to reschedule or cancel the class. If you give me less than 24 hours notice, there is no refund because I will not be able to give your class to another student, and I might plan my day differently.

pro_course_detail.title: STUDENTS WHO STARTED BEFORE MARCH 2022 (ALL COURSES)
pro_course_detail.description:
NOT FOR NEW STUDENTS!!! 

This pricing is only available to old (existing, before September 2021) students.

IMPORTANT: If you are NOT one of those students, I will DECLINE your booking.

teacher_info.intro:
Hello, I m Mehri. I live in Istanbul, Turkey for 10 years. I did my MBA (Master's degree) here. Turkish and Azerbaijani are my native languages. In Azerbaijan, the Russian language is a native language too, so we can learn all about these languages. In spite of the difficulties of these languages, I believe that we can make it easy together.

10 seneden fazladir Turkiye Istanbulda yasayan, dil konusunda yetenekli, saglik turizmi uzerine kurdugum kendi sirketime ayridigim zamanlarin disinda kalacak bos vaktimi degerlendirmek, sosyallesmek ve birilerine birseyler ogretebilmek istedigim icin,  Rusca Azerbaycanca ve Turkce ozel dersler veren ingilizce Isletme Masteri (MBA)  yapmis biriyim.
teacher_info.about_me:
Hello, I m Mehri. I live in Istanbul, Turkey for 10 years. I did my MBA (Master's degree) here. Turkish and Azerbaijani are my native languages. In Azerbaijan, the Russian language is a native language too, so we can learn all about these languages. In spite of the difficulties of these languages, I believe that we can make it easy together.

10 seneden fazladir Turkiye Istanbulda yasayan, dil konusunda yetenekli, saglik turizmi uzerine kurdugum kendi sirketime ayridigim zamanlarin disinda kalacak bos vaktimi degerlendirmek, sosyallesmek ve birilerine birseyler ogretebilmek istedigim icin,  Rusca Azerbaycanca ve Turkce ozel dersler veren ingilizce Isletme Masteri (MBA)  yapmis biriyim.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I aim to make my lessons fun and interactive. I am a very patient and compassionate teacher. I encourage you to make mistakes. Since mistakes are signs of learning. I am friendly and knowledgeable about many different topics. I look forward to learning something new. Hope to see you soon.

Kendimi samimi, guleryuzlu, sabirli, anlayisli, dikkatli, sonuc odakli birisi olarak nitelendirebilirim.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
From A1 to C2 - we can evaluate all of your choices about reading, listening, speaking, test, assignments. But "a good beginning is half the battle". So let's get started.

Tercihe bagli olarak alfabeden baslayarak gramer uzerinden ilerlemek veya sadeve sohbet tarzinda ders programi olusturabiliriz. Yine tercih uzerine resimler uzerinden calismalar, metinler, ev okumalari, testler, vs verilebilir.

course_info.trial_description:
Gəlin tanış olaq, dərslərimizi planlayaq.
 Gelin tanışalım, derslerimizi planlayalım. 
Let's try to make Azerbaijani or Turkish easy together!

pro_course_detail.title: Azerbaijani
pro_course_detail.description: Explaining simple words, using pictures,  visuals, and voices to making easy, enjoyable, and practical.

pro_course_detail.title: Turkish
pro_course_detail.description: We will learn all about Turkish Language Grammar here. Explaining simple words, using pictures,  visuals, and voices to making easy, enjoyable, and practical.

pro_course_detail.title: Turkish Conversation
pro_course_detail.description: Dili unutmamak için sürekli pratik yapmak gerekir. Gelin birlikte sohbet edelim, türkçeyi unutmayalım!

pro_course_detail.title: Azerbaijani Conversation
pro_course_detail.description: Dili unutmamaq üçün mütəmadi olaraq təcrübə etmək şərtdir. Gəlin, birlikdə söhbət edək, Azərbaycan dilini unutmayaq!

pro_course_detail.title: Azerbaijani Diction for Foreigners
pro_course_detail.description:
The main purpose of learning a foreign language is to speak a language clearly. Speaking is one of the basic language skills such as writing, listening and reading, is the most obvious criterion for learning a language.
We will acquire the language throught the basic material of diction, voice, breath, and speech, combined with the speaking skills in  this Azerbaijani Diction to Foreigners session. 

Hoping that Azerbaijani will become the most spoken and desired language in the world.

pro_course_detail.title: Turkish Diction for Foreigner / for Turkish
pro_course_detail.description:
Sadece türkçe konuşanlar için uygundur.
Türkçe sunuculuk becerileri, tiyatro -sahne, dublaj, diksiyon eğitimleri almış biri olarak Türklere ve /veya yabancılara uygun tekniklerle doğru telaffuz, diksiyon becerilerini kazandırmayı amaçlıyorum. 

The main purpose of learning a foreign language is to speak a language clearly. Speaking is one of the basic language skills such as writing, listening and reading, is the most obvious criterion for learning a language.
We will acquire the language throught the basic material of diction, voice, breath, and speech, combined with the speaking skills in  this Turkish Diction to Foreigners session. 

Hoping that Turkish will become the most spoken and desired language in the world.

pro_course_detail.title: Basic Russian Grammar
pro_course_detail.description: We will learn all about Russian Language Grammar here. Explaining simple words, using pictures,  visuals, and voices to making easy, enjoyable, and practical.

teacher_info.intro:
Positive and kind person with open and inquisitive mind.
Passionate hiking and yoga practitioner.
ISFJ ;)

Добрый, любознательный и позитивный человек без лишних предрассудков.
Обожаю пешие походы и йогу.
ISFJ ;)
teacher_info.about_me:
Positive and kind person with open and inquisitive mind.
Passionate hiking and yoga practitioner.
ISFJ ;)

Добрый, любознательный и позитивный человек без лишних предрассудков.

ISFJ ;)
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Even though my experience teaching Russian is little, my enthusiasm is great!)
I`ve been teaching English for 2 years in groups and individually. I use my previous experience learning English and Portuguese and working at the Anglo-American School of Saint-Petersburg. Currently I`m taking the TEFL course (Teaching English as a Foreign Language). The course is relevant for any language actually!)

Несмотря на то, что у меня небольшой опыт преподавания русского языка, мой энтузиазм велик!)
2 года преподаю англ.яз. в группах и индивидуально, где использую свой предыдущий опыт изучения англ. и португ. языков и работы в Англо-Американской школе в СПб. Сейчас я прохожу курс TEFL.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Depending on the level and personal preferences and needs the lesson can and should be tailored for each student individually.
When starting with basics it can be learning new phrases, reading, grammar tasks.
With an independent user we can discuss a text, focusing on grammar and new vocabulary.
It can be that you simply need speaking practice in terms of not to forget or hone your skill.

Please let me know about your level, what you would like to learn or do.

В зависимости от вашего уровня и желаний я подстроюсь под вас.
Можно начать с основ\ обсуждать текст, изучая грамматическую основу, или просто разговаривать.
Пожалуйста, напишите мне, над чем бы вы хотели поработать.

course_info.trial_description:
The lesson will be tailored depending on your level and personal preferences and needs.
At the beginning we can learn new phrases and recognize the alphabet, read.
With the independentintermediate level learner we can discuss a text, focusing on grammar and new vocabulary.
Or may be you simply need speaking practice in terms of not to forget or hone your language?
Please let me know about your level, what you would like to learn or do.

В зависимости от вашего уровня и желаний, я подстроюсь под вас.
Можно начать с основ, обсуждать текст, изучая грамматическую основу, или просто разговаривать.
Пожалуйста, напишите мне над чем бы вы хотели поработать иили ваш примерный уровень.

pro_course_detail.title: Communicative Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
Reading skills \ conversational practice \ grammar

Gender of the nouns and Cases, Verbs and Tenses, Prefixes and Conjunctions

Please let me know in advance what your goal\level\preference is and let`s practice!)

teacher_info.intro: Меня зовут Виктор. Я носитель русского языка, родился, вырос и живу в России. По образованию я преподаватель математики, имею ученую степень физико-математических наук и ученое звание доцента. Свободное время я посвящаю в основном ведению своего YouTube канала. Владею английским языком на уровне Intermediate.
teacher_info.about_me: Меня зовут Виктор. Я носитель русского языка, родился, вырос и живу в России. По образованию я преподаватель математики, имею ученую степень физико-математических наук и ученое звание доцента. Свободное время я посвящаю в основном ведению своего YouTube канала. Владею английским языком на уровне Intermediate.
teacher_info.about_teacher: Я являюсь носителем русского языка. Акцент московский. Русский язык преподаю как репетитор. Провожу индивидуальные занятия онлайн.
teacher_info.teaching_style: Уроки проходят онлайн. На вводном уроке мы знакомимся, определяем цели занятий. Исходя из этих целей, текущего уровня и Ваших интересов сформулируем примерный план следующих встреч. Основная цель занятий - совершенствование разговорных навыков. Сами занятия проходят в форме диалога, в форме обсуждения определенной темы. Возможно также включение в занятие чтения и обсуждения текстов из новостей по определенным заранее темам.

course_info.trial_description: На пробном уроке мы познакомимся, определим цели занятий. Исходя из Ваших интересов, текущего уровня и целей определим примерный план дальнейших занятий.

pro_course_detail.title: Разговорная практика
pro_course_detail.description: Занятие проводится в форме диалога, в виде обсуждения определенной темы. В ходе разговора я корректирую структуру предложения, произношение, при необходимости предлагаю синонимы.

pro_course_detail.title: Чтение и разговорный практикум
pro_course_detail.description: На занятии будет преложено прочитать небольшой текст. После прочтения идет обсуждения содержания текста. В ходе обсуждения я корректирую структуру предложения, произношение, при необходимости предлагаю синонимы.

teacher_info.intro: Hi! My name is Natalia. I am from Saint-Petersburg in Russia. I have a law degree and worked for a couple of years as a lawyer for international consulting companies. I love travelling and learning foreign languages. I really enjoy meeting people and discovering new things. I am really keen on topics of personal growth, psychology, art, design, health and nutrition. I believe that patience, practice and finding a right person who is sharing your values and interests is a key for a success in progressing while learning a language.
teacher_info.about_me: Hi! My name is Natalia. I am from Saint-Petersburg in Russia. I have a law degree and worked for a couple of years as a lawyer for international consulting companies. I love travelling and learning foreign languages. I really enjoy meeting people and discovering new things. I am really keen on topics of personal growth, psychology, art, design, health and nutrition. I believe that patience, practice and finding a right person who is sharing your values and interests is a key for a success in progressing while learning a language.
teacher_info.about_teacher: While I have an experience of learning languages and passing language tests I always put myself in student's shoes.  My analytical skills and a legal background help me to explain necessary rules and expressions in a clear and a simple way. I also have a coaching experience as I was a coach and an adviser of a university team which participated in the international legal competition.
teacher_info.teaching_style: I will be glad to help you with Russian or English. My lessons are generally based on communication. We can discuss different topics or to work on preparation for an oral part of an exam, a presentation or a job interview. I am looking for explanations and examples which make it easier to memorize an information and vocabulary. I am always focused on the most effective way to help a student to achieve his or her results. However, I never forget about making a lesson interesting and fun.

course_info.trial_description:
Я буду рада провести пробный урок, чтобы мы могли лучше узнать друг друга. Я верю, что грамотный выбор языкового партнёра для практики языка - это 50 % успеха.

I will be glad to become your communication partner that we could know each other better. I believe that choosing a right language partner for practicing your communication skills is a 50 % of success.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian conversation practice
pro_course_detail.description:
Давайте улучшим ваш русский язык вместе! Каждый урок будет основан на обсуждении интересных и актуальных тем, подготовке к собеседованию, презентации или иной деятельности. Всё на твой выбор! Важно, что мы будем сконцентрированы на достижении твоей индивидуальной цели.

Let's make your Russian better together! Each lesson will be based on the discussion of interesting and actual topics, preparation for the job interview, presentation or any other activity. It is up to you! The main thing is that we will be focused on your individual goal.

* 90-minute lessons are held with a 5 minute break

pro_course_detail.title: English conversation practice
*For students started with me before April, 2021* English conversation practice
*For students started with me before April, 2021* Russian conversation practice
pro_course_detail.description:
Давайте улучшим ваш русский язык вместе! Каждый урок будет основан на обсуждении интересных и актуальных тем, подготовке к собеседованию, презентации или иной деятельности. Всё на твой выбор! Важно, что мы будем сконцентрированы на достижении твоей индивидуальной цели.

Let's make your Russian better together! Each lesson will be based on the discussion of interesting and actual topics, preparation for the job interview, presentation or any other activity. It is up to you! The main thing is that we will be focused on your individual goal.


* 90-minute lessons are held with a 5 minute break

teacher_info.intro:
Здравствуйте!Меня зовут Анастасия и я из Украины.Я родилась в Днепропетровске(Днепр),но сейчас живу в прекрасном городе-Одесса.У меня есть диплом по специальности Отельно-ресторанный бизнес.Я очень позитивный и веселый человек. Я люблю шопинг,путешествия,читать книги и самое главное-обучать людей языкам.

Hello! My name is Anastasiia and I am from Ukraine. I was born in Dnipropetrovsk (Dnipro), but now I live in the beautiful city called Odessa. I have a diploma in Hotel and Restaurant Business. I am a very positive and cheerful person. I love shopping, travelling, reading books and most importantly teaching people languages.
teacher_info.about_me:
Здравствуйте!Меня зовут Анастасия и я из Украины.Я родилась в Днепропетровске(Днепр),но сейчас живу в прекрасном городе-Одесса.У меня есть диплом по специальности Отельно-ресторанный бизнес.Я очень позитивный и веселый человек. Я люблю шопинг,путешествия,читать книги и самое главное-обучать людей языкам.

Hello! My name is Anastasiia and I am from Ukraine. I was born in Dnipropetrovsk (Dnipro), but now I live in the beautiful city called Odessa. I have a diploma in Hotel and Restaurant Business. I am a very positive and cheerful person. I love shopping, travelling, reading books and most importantly teaching people languages.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Обучать людей языкам-это не только моя профессия,но и мое хобби.Я очень люблю свое дело и чувствую большую радость,когда вижу результаты своих учеников.Я носитель русского и украинского языков.Я закончила русскую школу ,так что,как человек,знающий все тонкости этого сложного,но такого красивого языка я здесь,что бы помочь Вам усвоить его! Также,я преподаю английский уже более 5 лет.

To teach people languages is not only my profession, but also my hobby. I really love my job and feel great joy when I see the results of my students. I am a native speaker of Russian and Ukrainian so I will do my best to help you to deal with this language.
 I have also been teaching English for over 5 years.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Я хочу,чтобы мои студенты чувствовали себя максимально комфортно на моих занятиях.Я подбираю  только самые интересные материалы для обучения в соответствии с целями моих студентов.Все мы разные,так что индивидуальный подход обязателен.Мы можем говорить на разные темы, писать, читать статьи, слушать аудио, смотреть видео и обсуждать их.

I want my students to feel as comfortable as possible in my classes. I try to choose  only the most interesting  materials in accordance with the goals of my students. We are all different, so an individual approach is necessary.We can speak about whatever you want,write,read different articles,listen to the audio,watch video and discuss it.You choose!

course_info.trial_description: I invite you to get to know me as a teacher and my methods of work . No need to postpone.Book now and start your exciting journey in studying Russian or English with me!

pro_course_detail.title: A topic to talk on a rainy day-Conversation practice
pro_course_detail.description: This type of lesson is suitable for those who have already had experience in learning Russian and are already familiar with Russian grammar and vocabulary. I will help you to overcome language barriers and speak fluently and confidently. I will correct all your mistakes and suggest you ways how to improve your oral speech.The topic of our conversation you can choose by yourself and I will select the necessary materials.You can also leave the choice of the topic for me.It is up to you!

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for everyone!
pro_course_detail.description: This is a Russian language lesson, which includes learning grammar, practicing it, improving pronunciation, speaking, increasing vocabulary, and reading. If you want, we can focus on one thing. For example, if you are interested in Russian grammar, then we can work with it for the main part of the lesson, or if you want to work with the text, I can choose an interesting text to read and thus we will improve your pronunciation,reading skills you will get to know new words.

pro_course_detail.title: Help for you with your Russian homework
pro_course_detail.description:
If you have problems and difficulties with completing your homework that is a lesson for you! I will be happy to help you with it.You can get my help with any grammar,audio,vocabulary,speaking tasks.
I can also help you with writing essays, articles, reviews for films, books,writing  resume and any other written works in Russian translation of texts from English into Russian and back.

pro_course_detail.title: Classical lesson of an English language
pro_course_detail.description: This type of a lesson helps us to work with all language aspects. We work on listening, speaking, grammar, pronunciation,reading and even writing. According to your wish we can focus on one thing.You can write me in advance what exactly you want to do on a lesson and I will select materials needed.Undoubtedly,this kind of a lesson will improve your English 100% in all its aspects!

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation practice on a topic you like)
pro_course_detail.description: Conversation is a very important part of a language.The way you speak is one of the most important indicators on how well you know the language.This type of a lesson will definitely improve your communication skills and help you to understand how to express yourself. You can choose the topic you like and I will pick the materials.The range of topics can be very wide.For example, we can talk about food and drinks, fashion, shopping, family traditions, hobbies, daily habits, health, animals, travels, music, movies, nature, holidays, beauty, work, studies and a lot of other topics on your choice.It is up to you!

pro_course_detail.title: English homework)
pro_course_detail.description:
If you have problems and difficulties with completing your homework that is a lesson for you! I will be happy to help you with it.You can get my help with any grammar,audio,vocabulary,speaking tasks.
I can also help you with writing essays, articles, reviews for films, books,writing  resume and any other written works in English translation of texts from English into Russian and back.

teacher_info.intro:
Hi, I'm Lera, 26 and I have been teaching Russian to foreigners for over six years. Teaching Russian to foreigners makes me know many other interesting cultures, and that's one of the things I love of my job. Besides teaching,  I study English and Italian.

Здравствуйте, меня зовут Лера. Мне 26 лет. В 2018-ом году я закончила Петрозаводский Государственный университет. Работая с иностранцами, я открыла для себя много нового, узнала об укладе и традициях многих стран. Это настолько меня вдохновило, что я стала погружаться больше в иностранную культуру. На данный момент я сама изучаю 2 языка (итальянский и английский) и много путешествую.
teacher_info.about_me:
Hi, I'm Lera, 26 and I have been teaching Russian to foreigners for over six years. Teaching Russian to foreigners makes me know many other interesting cultures, and that's one of the things I love of my job. Besides teaching,  I study English and Italian.

Здравствуйте, меня зовут Лера. Мне 26 лет. В 2018-ом году я закончила Петрозаводский Государственный университет. Работая с иностранцами, я открыла для себя много нового, узнала об укладе и традициях многих стран. Это настолько меня вдохновило, что я стала погружаться больше в иностранную культуру. На данный момент я сама изучаю 2 языка (итальянский и английский) и много путешествую.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I started teaching as a volunteer during my degree program. Foreign students came to our university to learn Russian. Furthermore, I gave private lessons at my home town. In 2018 I moved to Italy and continued to teach adults and children.

Свою преподавательскую деятельность я начала еще в университете в роли волонтера. Студенты из разных стран приезжали на курсы русского языка. Далее я начала давать частные уроки на дому в своем городе. А в 2018 году я переехала в Италию продолжая преподавать для взрослых и детей.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
During the first class I define the student's proficiency in Russian in order to plan tailored classes. Together we will perfectionate pronounciation, grammar and lexicon. If needed, we can start with the cyrillic alphabet. Classes will be planned according to student's interests.

На первом уроке я определяю уровень владения русского языка и подготавливаю индивидуальную программу для каждого ученика. Мы работаем над правильным произношением, знакомимся с грамматикой и лексикой, учимся читать. Учитываю желания ученика, чтобы занятия проходили максимально интересно и эффективно.

exp_info.description: Частный репетитор русского языка дистанционно и на дому.
Частный репетитор русского языка дистанционно и на дому.
Переводчик субтитров с английского языка на русский

course_info.trial_description: Let's get to know each other better and you will see how I teach Russian. Looking forward to meeting you!

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian for all levels
pro_course_detail.description:
I'm Valeriya and I'm Russian native speaker. I have been living in Italy for six years already and I am teaching Russian as a foreign language. In our classes we will see that Russian is not as hard as it is to believe. Perseverance is the key. Starting from no knowledge of Russian you can be proficient in just a few months by being perseverant. We will start from your passions to make the lessons interesting and effective. 
See you!

pro_course_detail.title: Russian speaking
pro_course_detail.description: These classes are for those who want to improve their speaking skills. We will chose topics of interest and we will discuss them together. Great focus also on pronounciation, informal language, as well as russian collocations and phrasal verbs.

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian for all levels (10 lessons) 14$/60 min.
pro_course_detail.description:
I'm Valeriya and I'm Russian native speaker. I have been living in Italy for three years already and I am teaching Russian as a foreign language. In our classes we will see that Russian is not as hard as it is to believe. Perseverance is the key. Starting from no knowledge of Russian you can be proficient in just a few months by being perseverant. We will start from your passions to make the lessons interesting and effective. 
See you!

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian for all levels (20 lessons) 12$/60 min.

I'm Valeriya and I'm Russian native speaker. I have been living in Italy for three years already and I am teaching Russian as a foreign language. In our classes we will see that Russian is not as hard as it is to believe. Perseverance is the key. Starting from no knowledge of Russian you can be proficient in just a few months by being perseverant. We will start from your passions to make the lessons interesting and effective.
